import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function List() { const [list,setList]=useState(null) async function getList(){ const fetchedList = await axios.get("http://localhost:8000/my-list").then(res=>{console.log(res);setList(res.data)}) } async function updateList(){ const fetchedList = await axios.get("http://localhost:8000/update") } async function deleteList(){ const fetchedList = await axios.get("http://localhost:8000/delete") } useEffect(()=>{ getList() },[]) return ( <> {/* {list ? list.map(ele=>

{ele.filmName}

) : "loading"} */}

Puma Shoes

The best shoes in the marketplace

65 $

) } export default List
